sys_script.name: Blocking the registration

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_00043e0797ed22105e14938de053af18
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1732764_lunch_an_lunch_data</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Blocking the registration</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, gForm, gUser, gs) {
  var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1732764_lunch_an_lunch_data');
  gr.addQuery('date', current.date);
  gr.addQuery('created_by_user', current.created_by_user);
  if (current.operation() === 'update') {
    gr.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id); // 自分自身を除外
  }
  gr.query();

  if (gr.hasNext()) {
    gs.addErrorMessage('このユーザーと日付の組み合わせのレコードは既に存在します。');
    current.setAbortAction(true);
  }
})(current, gForm, gUser, gs);


]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-21 07:27:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>00043e0797ed22105e14938de053af18</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Blocking the registration</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Lunch analysis" source="x_1732764_lunch_an">3ed8118b97e522105e14938de053afe8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Lunch analysis">3ed8118b97e522105e14938de053afe8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_00043e0797ed22105e14938de053af18</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-21 07:38:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=00043e0797ed22105e14938de053af18"/></record_update>
